About Me

Get to know me better

Hi everyone! I am a front-end developer and I've been part of the IT industy for about 2 years. I decided to change careers inspired by the technological advances and the immense creativity and innovation that the IT industry has to offer. I am both a visual and a logical person, and I find these two sides fitting perfectly into my current profession. I enjoy working on visually attractive web applications, written in clean, functional and optimized code, using the latest technologies. At the moment I am mostly working with React and on the side I do UX/UI web design gigs. I am deatail-oriented, curious, adaptable and dedicated, and I see myself working in a creative environment, in diverse and ambitious teams, where I can grow as a developer and deliver excellent products. I am always open to learning new technologies, working on different projects and expanding my skills and knowledge.

Sourcico

Web Developer

After finishing my web development studies, I started a 4-month internship in Sourcico, where from day one I had the chance to work with a highly productive team, working on a complex and sophisticated software in an international environment. I quickly gained a lot of practical skills that enabled me to grow from a web developer student to a web developer in a very short period of time. After my internship finished, I continued as a full-time employee in the same company and the same team. Perion, the project that we are working on, is a digital advertising ecosystem that consists of several applications and microservices. Working on such a challenging project offers me a constant opportunity for growth and advancement, and this is what I love the most about my current job. The stack that we are using is React/Node.js.

SEAVUS Education And Development Center

Web Development Academy Student

During my studies I immersed myself deep into web-development. From HTML, CSS and JS, to C#, MVC, ASP.NET, Databases, etc, I got a chance to explore the development process from the begining to the end. One of my most enjoyable projects was the making of 'Makdental Web Page' where I worked in a team of 8 students. I was responsible for client communication and consultation, wireframing and full-design (clickable prototype) based on client requirements, front-end implementation (partial), client presentations in stage 1 (design) and stage 2 (front-end) and team management (basic scrum). This project enabled me to gain valuable real-life experience in the insdustry.

University Ss.Cyril and Methodius

Doctor of Dental Medicine

Studying dentistry taught me all about hard work, determination, time management and studying smart. During my 6-year studies I developed a habit of continuous dedication which was my key for success. I was awarded with a state scholarship for talented students in Medical Science Studies for each academic year from 2013 to 2017. During my university years I also worked, volunteered and travelled. By the age of 24 I had a graduate degree and I visited 42 countries, mostly through participation in international projects, conferences, camps, symposiums, training courses and exchanges. Those years have been truly formative and were a crucial part of my development as a person and as a professional.
